id.description: The unique identifier of the conversation.

groupId.description: The unique identifier of the group where the conversation belongs.

topic.description: The topic or subject of the conversation.

hasAttachments.description: Indicates if the conversation has any attachments.

lastDeliveredDateTime.description: The date and time when the last message was delivered in the conversation.

uniqueSenders.description: An array of unique senders in the conversation.

preview.description: A preview or snippet of the conversation content.
